The Catholic Church needs to change some of its ideas. It is losing followers because it is not accepting of many things.  

For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are strong views, but some people think they are old-fashioned. 

Some people are leaving the Church because they disagree with these views. They feel the Church's ideas are wrong. 

The Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you might not feel comfortable in this Church.

The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you might not want to be part of a Church that does not. 

I think the Church should allow female priests and married priests.

It is hard to say if this would have stopped bad things from happening in the Church, but it might have helped. 

People have jobs and families. Why can't priests have both? The Church says priests are married to God, but everyone else has a job and a family too.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people should be able to marry who they love. Gay people are born that way, it is not a choice. It is wrong to say that men and women can marry but gay people cannot. Everyone should have the same rights.

I have not thought much about this topic, but I think it is wrong to tell people who they can and cannot love. 

I was born straight, but some people are born gay. It is not a choice. People should not be punished for who they are.

The government should not be involved. It is a personal decision. It is not a legal or moral issue.

Many people think gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to allow it. Some people say gay couples are bad for families. But gay relationships are different. They have many parts, just like families.

Gay couples deserve the same rights as straight couples. For example, they should have the same rights to property and health care. If a gay partner is sick, they should be able to visit their partner in the hospital.

Research shows that gay couples are just as happy as straight couples. They have the same things in their relationships that make them strong.

Gay marriage is not about religion. It's about a legal document from the government. The government should not tell people who they can marry.

Some people say gay marriage will harm children. But research does not support this idea. Parents who love their children are good parents, no matter what their sexual orientation. 

The government should let gay couples marry. Everyone deserves to be treated equally.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many drugs. Some drugs are illegal. But some illegal drugs can help people.

I think people should not use illegal drugs. But some drugs can be good for health. Like, some illegal drugs are used in hospitals. They help people feel better.

Some drugs are illegal because people think they are bad. But just because something is illegal does not mean it is bad. 

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people. It is not as bad as some other drugs.

People should not drink too much alcohol. Alcohol can be bad. Marijuana can be bad too if you use too much.

It is hard to say if marijuana should be legal. Maybe it should be legal slowly.

People think marijuana is bad. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If people know marijuana is not so bad, they might use it safely.

I think the church has changed to fit the twenty-first century. It is not as strict as before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a cute dress, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on the weekends. 

We would go to church together. Now that I am older, there is a special mass for teenagers that is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They come straight from the beach in their swimsuits. Families often run in late. 

Even at the morning masses, where I used to dress up, people wear jeans and khakis. It is much more casual.

That is the biggest change I have noticed. As for other things, that is the biggest thing I have seen. I do not know about the church's politics, but that is what I have observed.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests about pedophilia, I do not think these could have been prevented if the church allowed women priests or priests to marry.

There are married men who become pedophiles. They still have attractions to young children. Even if they were married, I think it would not change anything. It is the person, not whether they are married or not.

When someone becomes a priest, it is their choice. There are other religions where priests are allowed to marry, like on the TV show "7th Heaven." I know it is a little different, but if someone really wants to practice their faith and be married, maybe they should consider a different religion. 

I think pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born that way. It might be influenced by their upbringing, but I think it is mainly genetics. You cannot hide that with marriage. You could try, but it would usually come out. I do not think the church could have done anything to prevent this from happening. If they knew and tried to cover it up, then they are to blame. But I do not think they always knew.

I feel upset about the Iraq War. 
At first, I agreed with the idea. But many people were scared after September 11. The Bush leaders said the war was about stopping terrorism. They said Saddam Hussein had weapons that could hurt many people. We now know this was not true.

I think the Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, says he was not sure about the evidence even when he spoke. That is wrong. It is wrong to lie to the people.

The Bush group has not cared about the rules of our country. They want to use more power.

I think they wanted to go to war before they were elected. 

The man who ran money for the country said that the younger Bush wanted to fight Saddam Hussein because his father did not defeat him. 

The war has gone on too long. It is hard to leave now because Iraq might have a civil war.

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help. But this could cause more problems. 

The government in Iraq is not working well. The Parliament does not do much. The leader has little power.

People who want to use violence still have power in Iraq. This makes it hard to have a good government.

I do not know a lot about the war in Iraq. It is not a real war because Congress did not declare it. It started after the attacks on September 11th. Some people say we went to Iraq to get revenge. 

I think we should not be there anymore. It is hard to build a democracy in Iraq.  It will take a long time. If we leave, Iraq will be upset. If we stay, they will be upset too.

I do not think we should use guns to show that we are strong. It is not fair to the people of Iraq. 

I feel bad for President Bush. He is becoming known as a bad president because of the war. People say it is a meaningless war.  

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I know some of them. I want them to come home safe. But Iraq is a dangerous place. The war has hurt many people.

The people of Iraq have a different culture than us. If we stay, we will try to make them like us. This will make them hate us more. 

I think the war will go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. It is not the state's place to say if it is legal or not. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says that there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not tell churches what to do.

Trying to make laws about this goes against what the Constitution says. It is like choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this.

Separation of church and state is important for religious freedom in the United States. Even if they try to make a new law, it would be wrong. It would be one of the few laws that stop people instead of the government.

I do not think the government should be involved. The person pushing for this law is just trying to follow his own beliefs as a Catholic. He is putting one religion above others. It is up to the churches to decide, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a law about this except for personal beliefs. It will not help the economy. It could even help society.

The war in Iraq is a complicated issue. The government did not tell the American people the whole truth about why they wanted to go to war. They tried to connect the war to the September 11th terrorist attacks, even though they were not really related. The government used the fear and anger from 9/11 to push people to support the war. The war started in 2003.

I am against war, especially when a country attacks another country first. I think the war in Iraq is similar to the Vietnam War. The government should have learned from its mistakes in Vietnam.

Many American soldiers have died in Iraq. The US took over the Iraqi government, but they were not prepared for what would happen after. There was a lot of chaos and fighting. The US tried to create a democracy in Iraq, just like they tried to do in Vietnam.

But it's hard to build a democracy in a country that is already in conflict. There will always be people who do not want the new government. 

The US government should have known that this would be a long and difficult war. They did not tell the American people that it would take a long time and be very hard. 

We are still in Iraq today, and many American soldiers are still dying. We are trying to train Iraqi soldiers to protect their own country. It is a slow process. I think the US government tried to mislead the American people by making them think the war would be quick and easy.

It is hard to know what to do now. We have been in Iraq for a long time, and it is hard to leave. But it is also hard to keep sending our soldiers to fight and die.

I think it is important to remember that oil is a big reason why the US went to war in Iraq. We need oil, and Iraq has a lot of it.

We also need to think about why the US does not attack other countries with weapons of mass destruction, like North Korea. It seems like the US only goes to war when it is in its own best interest.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a personal choice. Many studies show that sexual orientation can be biological, not just a social choice. To deny people rights because of something they cannot control is wrong.

I think it is not fair that the government has a say in who people can marry. It is a private matter between two people.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and live their lives. They just can't get married because it is not legal.

I think it is wrong that the government tries to tell people what to do about marriage. It is a personal decision.

I believe that being gay is often caused by biology. Studies show that sexual orientation can be in a person's genes.

People should be free to marry who they love without government interference. It should be a private matter.

The internet is a public place. When you put something on the internet, everyone can see it. As a resident advisor, I have seen this. If you put bad things on the internet, it can hurt you. People will judge you. If you talk about hurting people or doing bad things, someone will tell the school. The school has to act. They cannot ignore it. What if something bad happens? The school could be in trouble if they did nothing.

It can be hard to know what is real on the internet. Some people joke around, but sometimes people mean what they say. I once had a situation where a student said bad things on the internet. Someone told the school, and the school looked at his Facebook page. There were things on his page that made them worried. He may have meant them as a joke, but they were very serious.

When you put things on the internet, you lose some privacy. If you do not want people to know something, do not put it on the internet. You cannot control what people think.  Schools should not be friends with students on social media and look at their pages. But if someone tells the school about something bad, they have to take it seriously.

School officials should not be listening to phone calls or reading texts. But if someone tells them about a problem, they have to do something. 

I do not think teachers should make fake social media accounts to watch their students. That is wrong. I do not want to know what my residents are doing on the internet. It is not my place.

I think the war has gone on too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help another country get democracy. But now, I think we are fighting for other reasons. Maybe we want to show that we are powerful. 

Maybe the reason for the war was not good in the first place.  It might have been about problems between President Bush's father and Saddam Hussein. If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that would be good. But if it was about personal reasons, that would not be fair.

The war started to make a statement in the beginning. But it has been going on for too long. It should have been over after a few months. 

Our goal was to help a country without a fair government.  

But I think our reason for fighting has changed. Now it seems like we just want to win.

The war has lasted long enough. The people in that country need to fight for themselves. We have spent a lot of money on the war.

We need that money for things at home. We have problems like poverty and bad schools. We should use that money to help our own people. We are spending billions of dollars to fight a war that we no longer need to fight.

I want to ask a question. Someone found something on the internet that stopped a bad thing from happening.  Is that okay? 

I don't think that is an invasion of privacy. If you put things on the internet, people can see them.

On Myspace, you have to be friends with someone to see their profile. But if you are friends, you let them see it.

When you put things online, you should know that many people can see them. So, if someone saw that and stopped something bad, that is good.


It is hard to say if it is always right. You can't have someone watch everyone's profile all the time. But maybe they were looking for something specific.

I don't have Myspace, but I have Facebook. It worries me that people can see things about me. I saw on TV that someone can get a lot of information about a person quickly from their profile. They can even talk to them online. 

I would never meet someone I don't know from the internet. Some people in my class message me on Facebook, but I don't know them. They know my name, my classes, and my friends. They know a lot about me.

I try to keep my Facebook private, but it's hard. 

I heard that a school banned Myspace. I don't think the school can tell students what they can and cannot do online.

I feel unsure talking about this. I do not want to sound like everyone else who says they were against the Iraq War from the start.  It's hard to say now because most people think it was a bad idea, except those in charge who do not want to admit they made a mistake. 

We see this in polls. In the United States, Iraq, and around the world, polls show that 75 to 80 percent of people think it was wrong. Even many U.S. soldiers in Iraq agree and want us to leave.

It has been a disaster from the beginning. Pulling out will also be difficult. There are no easy solutions in the Middle East.

I think there is a big difference between the United States and the Middle East. Our government cannot force democracy on a place that does not want it. Saddam Hussein was bad, but we should have carefully considered the costs before invading. 

I do not know what to say about this. I do not see a good reason to stay any longer. The government might have reasons, but I do not agree with them.  

I believe we should leave within a year, maybe even sooner.  Most Iraqis want us to leave.  They know best what is good for them. If we ask them and they say leave, we cannot blame ourselves if things go wrong. 

We will never be seen as good guys in the Middle East, but leaving would be better than staying.

I think that gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not just a problem for women. 

It depends on the job. Women often face a glass ceiling. Even though there should be equality, women sometimes have to work under a man because of how society has always been.  A woman might have the qualifications for a job, but the people in charge might not want to promote her. This is because people have always seen men as being in charge in business.

Men can face discrimination too. There are jobs where people expect a man to be the breadwinner, like being a stay-at-home parent.

For example, in the fashion industry, men are sometimes not taken seriously, especially straight men. This might be because people think fashion is only for women.  

In many fields, there is discrimination against people because of their gender. To change this, we need to keep working for equality. It is slow progress, but women are getting more jobs in high positions.  More men are staying home with their children, and people are starting to accept this.

It takes time to change people's minds. We need to show people the good qualities of those who are stereotyped. We can't force change, but we can keep working to make things better.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious.  
It is no longer a crime. It is like a traffic ticket. 

Some people worry about the future. Even if it is not a crime, it can still be a problem for jobs and other things.  

It costs money to arrest people. It costs money to keep them in jail. It costs money to take them to court. 

Some places do not want to spend this money.  

Denver is a place where people are more open to change. They think it is good to spend the money saved on other things, like schools and helping the poor.  

Marijuana should not be everywhere, but it is important to think about the cost of making it illegal. 

Some people worry that if it is legal, it will be sold everywhere. People might smoke it and drive. It is still not accepted in many places.

Alcohol is worse for driving. But marijuana can have a bad effect on a person's life.  

Every person reacts to drugs differently. Some people use them too much. Some people can use them in a safe way.

I say yes.
The Catholic Church is very old. 
They have done things the same way for a long time. 
It is good to keep traditions. 
But it is also good to change.
Many Catholics go to Church every week. They follow the rules very closely. 
Sometimes I feel the Church does not like people who do not follow all the rules.
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. 
They do not accept people of other religions.
My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic.  
They would not marry in the Catholic Church. 
The Church did not accept my dad’s religion.  
This is not being kind to other religions.  
We learned to love others. 
This is a Catholic teaching. 
But it is wrong to say to love others and not accept them.
The Church teaches to do things but then does not do them.
It is old and does not change.
I think it would be good if priests could marry.
But I do not think it would stop priests from doing bad things.
It is a different problem.
People who hurt children would probably hurt children even if they were married.
It is wrong to hurt children.

I am not sure what to think about this issue. I do not believe either side is right or wrong. But this is a difficult topic. It is hard to separate church and state.  

It is also hard to define marriage. I do not know if the government should define marriage. A marriage is a religious ceremony. The government does not care if people are baptized.

I think all couples should have civil unions. The government should not care if a marriage is religious or not. If two people love each other, they should be able to get married.

If all states agree on civil unions, then it should be a law for the whole country.

But I think it is wrong to change the constitution to ban gay marriage. The constitution should not be changed for something like this. Many people care about this issue, but it is not important enough to change the constitution.

I grew up in a Christian home. I have gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle, but I think gay marriage should be legal. It should be up to each state to decide. Some states are democratic and support gay marriage. People living in those states should not have to disagree with their state's choice.

Many states are democratic, many are republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you accept their choice. I think gay people should have the same rights as everyone else.  

I already said this, but I think each state should decide about gay marriage. President Bush should not tell the whole country what to do. He does not live in every state. States should make their own rules. He will not be president forever. A new president could change the law. It is better if each state decides. They will live with the decision.

Myspace is open to the public. If you post something on Myspace, others can see it. School officials can too. Even if they are not using the school's name, they can see your posts from home.

I think the school had the right to see what was on the Myspace page. Preventing school shootings is important. It is a responsibility of the school to keep students safe.

If they use Myspace to see if students are drinking or smoking, that is different. That is an invasion of privacy. But if they are trying to prevent something bad from happening, it is not an invasion.

It is easy to express yourself more fully in writing. 

You should not post things on Myspace that you do not want others to see. Everything you post online can be found later.  

Parents trust schools to keep their children safe. School shootings are a big concern. Schools practice lockdowns and drills to prepare for emergencies.

The school officials in this case were trying to keep the school safe. They were doing what they thought was best for the students.

I support the war at first. Nine Eleven affected me. I wanted to fight back. But now, I am against it.

We went to war without a clear plan. It did not help. The people there fight with each other. They can't stop fighting.

I do not care what happens to them. They are fighting and can't get along. Their war is different than ours. They are savage. They want us to leave.

We were not ready for war. We did not know what to expect. We went to war for revenge. President Bush wanted to fight. The people wanted to fight.

We had to fight back after Nine Eleven. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do after the fighting.

We did not have a clear goal. There was no unity. We went to war based on anger. Now, we are angry.

We cannot change them. They will always fight. We need to leave.

We are not making enough progress. We need to go home. We are hurting ourselves by staying.

Some people are leaving the Church because they disagree with these views. They feel the Church's ideas are wrong. 

The Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you might not feel comfortable in this Church.

The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you might not want to be part of a Church that does not. 

I think the Church should allow female priests and married priests.

It is hard to say if this would have stopped bad things from happening in the Church, but it might have helped. 

People have jobs and families. Why can't priests have both? The Church says priests are married to God, but everyone else has a job and a family too.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people should be able to marry who they love. Gay people are born that way, it is not a choice. It is wrong to say that men and women can marry but gay people cannot. Everyone should have the same rights.

I have not thought much about this topic, but I think it is wrong to tell people who they can and cannot love. 

I was born straight, but some people are born gay. It is not a choice. People should not be punished for who they are.

The government should not be involved. It is a personal decision. It is not a legal or moral issue.

Many people think gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to allow it. Some people say gay couples are bad for families. But gay relationships are different. They have many parts, just like families.

Gay couples deserve the same rights as straight couples. For example, they should have the same rights to property and health care. If a gay partner is sick, they should be able to visit their partner in the hospital.

Research shows that gay couples are just as happy as straight couples. They have the same things in their relationships that make them strong.

Gay marriage is not about religion. It's about a legal document from the government. The government should not tell people who they can marry.

Some people say gay marriage will harm children. But research does not support this idea. Parents who love their children are good parents, no matter what their sexual orientation. 

The government should let gay couples marry. Everyone deserves to be treated equally.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many drugs. Some drugs are illegal. But some illegal drugs can help people.

I think people should not use illegal drugs. But some drugs can be good for health. Like, some illegal drugs are used in hospitals. They help people feel better.

Some drugs are illegal because people think they are bad. But just because something is illegal does not mean it is bad. 

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people. It is not as bad as some other drugs.

People should not drink too much alcohol. Alcohol can be bad. Marijuana can be bad too if you use too much.

It is hard to say if marijuana should be legal. Maybe it should be legal slowly.

People think marijuana is bad. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If people know marijuana is not so bad, they might use it safely.

I think the church has changed to fit the twenty-first century. It is not as strict as before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a cute dress, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on the weekends. 

We would go to church together. Now that I am older, there is a special mass for teenagers that is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They come straight from the beach in their swimsuits. Families often run in late. 

Even at the morning masses, where I used to dress up, people wear jeans and khakis. It is much more casual.

That is the biggest change I have noticed. As for other things, that is the biggest thing I have seen. I do not know about the church's politics, but that is what I have observed.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests about pedophilia, I do not think these could have been prevented if the church allowed women priests or priests to marry.

There are married men who become pedophiles. They still have attractions to young children. Even if they were married, I think it would not change anything. It is the person, not whether they are married or not.

When someone becomes a priest, it is their choice. There are other religions where priests are allowed to marry, like on the TV show "7th Heaven." I know it is a little different, but if someone really wants to practice their faith and be married, maybe they should consider a different religion. 

I think pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born that way. It might be influenced by their upbringing, but I think it is mainly genetics. You cannot hide that with marriage. You could try, but it would usually come out. I do not think the church could have done anything to prevent this from happening. If they knew and tried to cover it up, then they are to blame. But I do not think they always knew.

I feel upset about the Iraq War. 
At first, I agreed with the idea. But many people were scared after September 11. The Bush leaders said the war was about stopping terrorism. They said Saddam Hussein had weapons that could hurt many people. We now know this was not true.

I think the Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, says he was not sure about the evidence even when he spoke. That is wrong. It is wrong to lie to the people.

The Bush group has not cared about the rules of our country. They want to use more power.

I think they wanted to go to war before they were elected. 

The man who ran money for the country said that the younger Bush wanted to fight Saddam Hussein because his father did not defeat him. 

The war has gone on too long. It is hard to leave now because Iraq might have a civil war.

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help. But this could cause more problems. 

The government in Iraq is not working well. The Parliament does not do much. The leader has little power.

People who want to use violence still have power in Iraq. This makes it hard to have a good government.

I do not know a lot about the war in Iraq. It is not a real war because Congress did not declare it. It started after the attacks on September 11th. Some people say we went to Iraq to get revenge. 

I think we should not be there anymore. It is hard to build a democracy in Iraq.  It will take a long time. If we leave, Iraq will be upset. If we stay, they will be upset too.

I do not think we should use guns to show that we are strong. It is not fair to the people of Iraq. 

I feel bad for President Bush. He is becoming known as a bad president because of the war. People say it is a meaningless war.  

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I know some of them. I want them to come home safe. But Iraq is a dangerous place. The war has hurt many people.

The people of Iraq have a different culture than us. If we stay, we will try to make them like us. This will make them hate us more. 

I think the war will go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. It is not the state's place to say if it is legal or not. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says that there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not tell churches what to do.

Trying to make laws about this goes against what the Constitution says. It is like choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this.

Separation of church and state is important for religious freedom in the United States. Even if they try to make a new law, it would be wrong. It would be one of the few laws that stop people instead of the government.

I do not think the government should be involved. The person pushing for this law is just trying to follow his own beliefs as a Catholic. He is putting one religion above others. It is up to the churches to decide, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a law about this except for personal beliefs. It will not help the economy. It could even help society.

The war in Iraq is a complicated issue. The government did not tell the American people the whole truth about why they wanted to go to war. They tried to connect the war to the September 11th terrorist attacks, even though they were not really related. The government used the fear and anger from 9/11 to push people to support the war. The war started in 2003.

I am against war, especially when a country attacks another country first. I think the war in Iraq is similar to the Vietnam War. The government should have learned from its mistakes in Vietnam.

Many American soldiers have died in Iraq. The US took over the Iraqi government, but they were not prepared for what would happen after. There was a lot of chaos and fighting. The US tried to create a democracy in Iraq, just like they tried to do in Vietnam.

But it's hard to build a democracy in a country that is already in conflict. There will always be people who do not want the new government. 

The US government should have known that this would be a long and difficult war. They did not tell the American people that it would take a long time and be very hard. 

We are still in Iraq today, and many American soldiers are still dying. We are trying to train Iraqi soldiers to protect their own country. It is a slow process. I think the US government tried to mislead the American people by making them think the war would be quick and easy.

It is hard to know what to do now. We have been in Iraq for a long time, and it is hard to leave. But it is also hard to keep sending our soldiers to fight and die.

I think it is important to remember that oil is a big reason why the US went to war in Iraq. We need oil, and Iraq has a lot of it.

We also need to think about why the US does not attack other countries with weapons of mass destruction, like North Korea. It seems like the US only goes to war when it is in its own best interest.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a personal choice. Many studies show that sexual orientation can be biological, not just a social choice. To deny people rights because of something they cannot control is wrong.

I think it is not fair that the government has a say in who people can marry. It is a private matter between two people.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and live their lives. They just can't get married because it is not legal.

I think it is wrong that the government tries to tell people what to do about marriage. It is a personal decision.

I believe that being gay is often caused by biology. Studies show that sexual orientation can be in a person's genes.

People should be free to marry who they love without government interference. It should be a private matter.

The internet is a public place. When you put something on the internet, everyone can see it. As a resident advisor, I have seen this. If you put bad things on the internet, it can hurt you. People will judge you. If you talk about hurting people or doing bad things, someone will tell the school. The school has to act. They cannot ignore it. What if something bad happens? The school could be in trouble if they did nothing.

It can be hard to know what is real on the internet. Some people joke around, but sometimes people mean what they say. I once had a situation where a student said bad things on the internet. Someone told the school, and the school looked at his Facebook page. There were things on his page that made them worried. He may have meant them as a joke, but they were very serious.

When you put things on the internet, you lose some privacy. If you do not want people to know something, do not put it on the internet. You cannot control what people think.  Schools should not be friends with students on social media and look at their pages. But if someone tells the school about something bad, they have to take it seriously.

School officials should not be listening to phone calls or reading texts. But if someone tells them about a problem, they have to do something. 

I do not think teachers should make fake social media accounts to watch their students. That is wrong. I do not want to know what my residents are doing on the internet. It is not my place.

I think the war has gone on too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help another country get democracy. But now, I think we are fighting for other reasons. Maybe we want to show that we are powerful. 

Maybe the reason for the war was not good in the first place.  It might have been about problems between President Bush's father and Saddam Hussein. If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that would be good. But if it was about personal reasons, that would not be fair.

The war started to make a statement in the beginning. But it has been going on for too long. It should have been over after a few months. 

Our goal was to help a country without a fair government.  

But I think our reason for fighting has changed. Now it seems like we just want to win.

The war has lasted long enough. The people in that country need to fight for themselves. We have spent a lot of money on the war.

We need that money for things at home. We have problems like poverty and bad schools. We should use that money to help our own people. We are spending billions of dollars to fight a war that we no longer need to fight.

I want to ask a question. Someone found something on the internet that stopped a bad thing from happening.  Is that okay? 

I don't think that is an invasion of privacy. If you put things on the internet, people can see them.

On Myspace, you have to be friends with someone to see their profile. But if you are friends, you let them see it.

When you put things online, you should know that many people can see them. So, if someone saw that and stopped something bad, that is good.


It is hard to say if it is always right. You can't have someone watch everyone's profile all the time. But maybe they were looking for something specific.

I don't have Myspace, but I have Facebook. It worries me that people can see things about me. I saw on TV that someone can get a lot of information about a person quickly from their profile. They can even talk to them online. 

I would never meet someone I don't know from the internet. Some people in my class message me on Facebook, but I don't know them. They know my name, my classes, and my friends. They know a lot about me.

I try to keep my Facebook private, but it's hard. 

I heard that a school banned Myspace. I don't think the school can tell students what they can and cannot do online.

I feel unsure talking about this. I do not want to sound like everyone else who says they were against the Iraq War from the start.  It's hard to say now because most people think it was a bad idea, except those in charge who do not want to admit they made a mistake. 

We see this in polls. In the United States, Iraq, and around the world, polls show that 75 to 80 percent of people think it was wrong. Even many U.S. soldiers in Iraq agree and want us to leave.

It has been a disaster from the beginning. Pulling out will also be difficult. There are no easy solutions in the Middle East.

I think there is a big difference between the United States and the Middle East. Our government cannot force democracy on a place that does not want it. Saddam Hussein was bad, but we should have carefully considered the costs before invading. 

I do not know what to say about this. I do not see a good reason to stay any longer. The government might have reasons, but I do not agree with them.  

I believe we should leave within a year, maybe even sooner.  Most Iraqis want us to leave.  They know best what is good for them. If we ask them and they say leave, we cannot blame ourselves if things go wrong. 

We will never be seen as good guys in the Middle East, but leaving would be better than staying.

I think that gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not just a problem for women. 

It depends on the job. Women often face a glass ceiling. Even though there should be equality, women sometimes have to work under a man because of how society has always been.  A woman might have the qualifications for a job, but the people in charge might not want to promote her. This is because people have always seen men as being in charge in business.

Men can face discrimination too. There are jobs where people expect a man to be the breadwinner, like being a stay-at-home parent.

For example, in the fashion industry, men are sometimes not taken seriously, especially straight men. This might be because people think fashion is only for women.  

In many fields, there is discrimination against people because of their gender. To change this, we need to keep working for equality. It is slow progress, but women are getting more jobs in high positions.  More men are staying home with their children, and people are starting to accept this.

It takes time to change people's minds. We need to show people the good qualities of those who are stereotyped. We can't force change, but we can keep working to make things better.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious.  
It is no longer a crime. It is like a traffic ticket. 

Some people worry about the future. Even if it is not a crime, it can still be a problem for jobs and other things.  

It costs money to arrest people. It costs money to keep them in jail. It costs money to take them to court. 

Some places do not want to spend this money.  

Denver is a place where people are more open to change. They think it is good to spend the money saved on other things, like schools and helping the poor.  

Marijuana should not be everywhere, but it is important to think about the cost of making it illegal. 

Some people worry that if it is legal, it will be sold everywhere. People might smoke it and drive. It is still not accepted in many places.

Alcohol is worse for driving. But marijuana can have a bad effect on a person's life.  

Every person reacts to drugs differently. Some people use them too much. Some people can use them in a safe way.

I say yes.
The Catholic Church is very old. 
They have done things the same way for a long time. 
It is good to keep traditions. 
But it is also good to change.
Many Catholics go to Church every week. They follow the rules very closely. 
Sometimes I feel the Church does not like people who do not follow all the rules.
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. 
They do not accept people of other religions.
My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic.  
They would not marry in the Catholic Church. 
The Church did not accept my dad’s religion.  
This is not being kind to other religions.  
We learned to love others. 
This is a Catholic teaching. 
But it is wrong to say to love others and not accept them.
The Church teaches to do things but then does not do them.
It is old and does not change.
I think it would be good if priests could marry.
But I do not think it would stop priests from doing bad things.
It is a different problem.
People who hurt children would probably hurt children even if they were married.
It is wrong to hurt children.

I am not sure what to think about this issue. I do not believe either side is right or wrong. But this is a difficult topic. It is hard to separate church and state.  

It is also hard to define marriage. I do not know if the government should define marriage. A marriage is a religious ceremony. The government does not care if people are baptized.

I think all couples should have civil unions. The government should not care if a marriage is religious or not. If two people love each other, they should be able to get married.

If all states agree on civil unions, then it should be a law for the whole country.

But I think it is wrong to change the constitution to ban gay marriage. The constitution should not be changed for something like this. Many people care about this issue, but it is not important enough to change the constitution.

I grew up in a Christian home. I have gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle, but I think gay marriage should be legal. It should be up to each state to decide. Some states are democratic and support gay marriage. People living in those states should not have to disagree with their state's choice.

Many states are democratic, many are republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you accept their choice. I think gay people should have the same rights as everyone else.  

I already said this, but I think each state should decide about gay marriage. President Bush should not tell the whole country what to do. He does not live in every state. States should make their own rules. He will not be president forever. A new president could change the law. It is better if each state decides. They will live with the decision.

Myspace is open to the public. If you post something on Myspace, others can see it. School officials can too. Even if they are not using the school's name, they can see your posts from home.

I think the school had the right to see what was on the Myspace page. Preventing school shootings is important. It is a responsibility of the school to keep students safe.

If they use Myspace to see if students are drinking or smoking, that is different. That is an invasion of privacy. But if they are trying to prevent something bad from happening, it is not an invasion.

It is easy to express yourself more fully in writing. 

You should not post things on Myspace that you do not want others to see. Everything you post online can be found later.  

Parents trust schools to keep their children safe. School shootings are a big concern. Schools practice lockdowns and drills to prepare for emergencies.

The school officials in this case were trying to keep the school safe. They were doing what they thought was best for the students.

I support the war at first. Nine Eleven affected me. I wanted to fight back. But now, I am against it.

We went to war without a clear plan. It did not help. The people there fight with each other. They can't stop fighting.

I do not care what happens to them. They are fighting and can't get along. Their war is different than ours. They are savage. They want us to leave.

We were not ready for war. We did not know what to expect. We went to war for revenge. President Bush wanted to fight. The people wanted to fight.

We had to fight back after Nine Eleven. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do after the fighting.

We did not have a clear goal. There was no unity. We went to war based on anger. Now, we are angry.

We cannot change them. They will always fight. We need to leave.

We are not making enough progress. We need to go home. We are hurting ourselves by staying.

The Catholic Church needs to change some of its ideas. It is losing followers because it is not accepting of many things.  

For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are strong views, but some people think they are old-fashioned. 

Some people are leaving the Church because they disagree with these views. They feel the Church's ideas are wrong. 

The Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you might not feel comfortable in this Church.

The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you might not want to be part of a Church that does not. 

I think the Church should allow female priests and married priests.

It is hard to say if this would have stopped bad things from happening in the Church, but it might have helped. 

People have jobs and families. Why can't priests have both? The Church says priests are married to God, but everyone else has a job and a family too.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people should be able to marry who they love. Gay people are born that way, it is not a choice. It is wrong to say that men and women can marry but gay people cannot. Everyone should have the same rights.

I have not thought much about this topic, but I think it is wrong to tell people who they can and cannot love. 

I was born straight, but some people are born gay. It is not a choice. People should not be punished for who they are.

The government should not be involved. It is a personal decision. It is not a legal or moral issue.

Many people think gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to allow it. Some people say gay couples are bad for families. But gay relationships are different. They have many parts, just like families.

Gay couples deserve the same rights as straight couples. For example, they should have the same rights to property and health care. If a gay partner is sick, they should be able to visit their partner in the hospital.

Research shows that gay couples are just as happy as straight couples. They have the same things in their relationships that make them strong.

Gay marriage is not about religion. It's about a legal document from the government. The government should not tell people who they can marry.

Some people say gay marriage will harm children. But research does not support this idea. Parents who love their children are good parents, no matter what their sexual orientation. 

The government should let gay couples marry. Everyone deserves to be treated equally.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many drugs. Some drugs are illegal. But some illegal drugs can help people.

I think people should not use illegal drugs. But some drugs can be good for health. Like, some illegal drugs are used in hospitals. They help people feel better.

Some drugs are illegal because people think they are bad. But just because something is illegal does not mean it is bad. 

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people. It is not as bad as some other drugs.

People should not drink too much alcohol. Alcohol can be bad. Marijuana can be bad too if you use too much.

It is hard to say if marijuana should be legal. Maybe it should be legal slowly.

People think marijuana is bad. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If people know marijuana is not so bad, they might use it safely.

I think the church has changed to fit the twenty-first century. It is not as strict as before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a cute dress, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on the weekends. 

We would go to church together. Now that I am older, there is a special mass for teenagers that is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They come straight from the beach in their swimsuits. Families often run in late. 

Even at the morning masses, where I used to dress up, people wear jeans and khakis. It is much more casual.

That is the biggest change I have noticed. As for other things, that is the biggest thing I have seen. I do not know about the church's politics, but that is what I have observed.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests about pedophilia, I do not think these could have been prevented if the church allowed women priests or priests to marry.

There are married men who become pedophiles. They still have attractions to young children. Even if they were married, I think it would not change anything. It is the person, not whether they are married or not.

When someone becomes a priest, it is their choice. There are other religions where priests are allowed to marry, like on the TV show "7th Heaven." I know it is a little different, but if someone really wants to practice their faith and be married, maybe they should consider a different religion. 

I think pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born that way. It might be influenced by their upbringing, but I think it is mainly genetics. You cannot hide that with marriage. You could try, but it would usually come out. I do not think the church could have done anything to prevent this from happening. If they knew and tried to cover it up, then they are to blame. But I do not think they always knew.

I feel upset about the Iraq War. 
At first, I agreed with the idea. But many people were scared after September 11. The Bush leaders said the war was about stopping terrorism. They said Saddam Hussein had weapons that could hurt many people. We now know this was not true.

I think the Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, says he was not sure about the evidence even when he spoke. That is wrong. It is wrong to lie to the people.

The Bush group has not cared about the rules of our country. They want to use more power.

I think they wanted to go to war before they were elected. 

The man who ran money for the country said that the younger Bush wanted to fight Saddam Hussein because his father did not defeat him. 

The war has gone on too long. It is hard to leave now because Iraq might have a civil war.

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help. But this could cause more problems. 

The government in Iraq is not working well. The Parliament does not do much. The leader has little power.

People who want to use violence still have power in Iraq. This makes it hard to have a good government.

I do not know a lot about the war in Iraq. It is not a real war because Congress did not declare it. It started after the attacks on September 11th. Some people say we went to Iraq to get revenge. 

I think we should not be there anymore. It is hard to build a democracy in Iraq.  It will take a long time. If we leave, Iraq will be upset. If we stay, they will be upset too.

I do not think we should use guns to show that we are strong. It is not fair to the people of Iraq. 

I feel bad for President Bush. He is becoming known as a bad president because of the war. People say it is a meaningless war.  

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I know some of them. I want them to come home safe. But Iraq is a dangerous place. The war has hurt many people.

The people of Iraq have a different culture than us. If we stay, we will try to make them like us. This will make them hate us more. 

I think the war will go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. It is not the state's place to say if it is legal or not. I think it is up to the churches. The Constitution says that there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not tell churches what to do.

Trying to make laws about this goes against what the Constitution says. It is like choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this.

Separation of church and state is important for religious freedom in the United States. Even if they try to make a new law, it would be wrong. It would be one of the few laws that stop people instead of the government.

I do not think the government should be involved. The person pushing for this law is just trying to follow his own beliefs as a Catholic. He is putting one religion above others. It is up to the churches to decide, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a law about this except for personal beliefs. It will not help the economy. It could even help society.

The war in Iraq is a complicated issue. The government did not tell the American people the whole truth about why they wanted to go to war. They tried to connect the war to the September 11th terrorist attacks, even though they were not really related. The government used the fear and anger from 9/11 to push people to support the war. The war started in 2003.

I am against war, especially when a country attacks another country first. I think the war in Iraq is similar to the Vietnam War. The government should have learned from its mistakes in Vietnam.

Many American soldiers have died in Iraq. The US took over the Iraqi government, but they were not prepared for what would happen after. There was a lot of chaos and fighting. The US tried to create a democracy in Iraq, just like they tried to do in Vietnam.

But it's hard to build a democracy in a country that is already in conflict. There will always be people who do not want the new government. 

The US government should have known that this would be a long and difficult war. They did not tell the American people that it would take a long time and be very hard. 

We are still in Iraq today, and many American soldiers are still dying. We are trying to train Iraqi soldiers to protect their own country. It is a slow process. I think the US government tried to mislead the American people by making them think the war would be quick and easy.

It is hard to know what to do now. We have been in Iraq for a long time, and it is hard to leave. But it is also hard to keep sending our soldiers to fight and die.

I think it is important to remember that oil is a big reason why the US went to war in Iraq. We need oil, and Iraq has a lot of it.

We also need to think about why the US does not attack other countries with weapons of mass destruction, like North Korea. It seems like the US only goes to war when it is in its own best interest.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a personal choice. Many studies show that sexual orientation can be biological, not just a social choice. To deny people rights because of something they cannot control is wrong.

I think it is not fair that the government has a say in who people can marry. It is a private matter between two people.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and live their lives. They just can't get married because it is not legal.

I think it is wrong that the government tries to tell people what to do about marriage. It is a personal decision.

I believe that being gay is often caused by biology. Studies show that sexual orientation can be in a person's genes.

People should be free to marry who they love without government interference. It should be a private matter.

The internet is a public place. When you put something on the internet, everyone can see it. As a resident advisor, I have seen this. If you put bad things on the internet, it can hurt you. People will judge you. If you talk about hurting people or doing bad things, someone will tell the school. The school has to act. They cannot ignore it. What if something bad happens? The school could be in trouble if they did nothing.

It can be hard to know what is real on the internet. Some people joke around, but sometimes people mean what they say. I once had a situation where a student said bad things on the internet. Someone told the school, and the school looked at his Facebook page. There were things on his page that made them worried. He may have meant them as a joke, but they were very serious.

When you put things on the internet, you lose some privacy. If you do not want people to know something, do not put it on the internet. You cannot control what people think.  Schools should not be friends with students on social media and look at their pages. But if someone tells the school about something bad, they have to take it seriously.

School officials should not be listening to phone calls or reading texts. But if someone tells them about a problem, they have to do something. 

I do not think teachers should make fake social media accounts to watch their students. That is wrong. I do not want to know what my residents are doing on the internet. It is not my place.

I think the war has gone on too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help another country get democracy. But now, I think we are fighting for other reasons. Maybe we want to show that we are powerful. 

Maybe the reason for the war was not good in the first place.  It might have been about problems between President Bush's father and Saddam Hussein. If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that would be good. But if it was about personal reasons, that would not be fair.

The war started to make a statement in the beginning. But it has been going on for too long. It should have been over after a few months. 

Our goal was to help a country without a fair government.  

But I think our reason for fighting has changed. Now it seems like we just want to win.

The war has lasted long enough. The people in that country need to fight for themselves. We have spent a lot of money on the war.

We need that money for things at home. We have problems like poverty and bad schools. We should use that money to help our own people. We are spending billions of dollars to fight a war that we no longer need to fight.

I want to ask a question. Someone found something on the internet that stopped a bad thing from happening.  Is that okay? 

I don't think that is an invasion of privacy. If you put things on the internet, people can see them.

On Myspace, you have to be friends with someone to see their profile. But if you are friends, you let them see it.

When you put things online, you should know that many people can see them. So, if someone saw that and stopped something bad, that is good.


It is hard to say if it is always right. You can't have someone watch everyone's profile all the time. But maybe they were looking for something specific.

I don't have Myspace, but I have Facebook. It worries me that people can see things about me. I saw on TV that someone can get a lot of information about a person quickly from their profile. They can even talk to them online. 

I would never meet someone I don't know from the internet. Some people in my class message me on Facebook, but I don't know them. They know my name, my classes, and my friends. They know a lot about me.

I try to keep my Facebook private, but it's hard. 

I heard that a school banned Myspace. I don't think the school can tell students what they can and cannot do online.

I feel unsure talking about this. I do not want to sound like everyone else who says they were against the Iraq War from the start.  It's hard to say now because most people think it was a bad idea, except those in charge who do not want to admit they made a mistake. 

We see this in polls. In the United States, Iraq, and around the world, polls show that 75 to 80 percent of people think it was wrong. Even many U.S. soldiers in Iraq agree and want us to leave.

It has been a disaster from the beginning. Pulling out will also be difficult. There are no easy solutions in the Middle East.

I think there is a big difference between the United States and the Middle East. Our government cannot force democracy on a place that does not want it. Saddam Hussein was bad, but we should have carefully considered the costs before invading. 

I do not know what to say about this. I do not see a good reason to stay any longer. The government might have reasons, but I do not agree with them.  

I believe we should leave within a year, maybe even sooner.  Most Iraqis want us to leave.  They know best what is good for them. If we ask them and they say leave, we cannot blame ourselves if things go wrong. 

We will never be seen as good guys in the Middle East, but leaving would be better than staying.

I think that gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not just a problem for women. 

It depends on the job. Women often face a glass ceiling. Even though there should be equality, women sometimes have to work under a man because of how society has always been.  A woman might have the qualifications for a job, but the people in charge might not want to promote her. This is because people have always seen men as being in charge in business.

Men can face discrimination too. There are jobs where people expect a man to be the breadwinner, like being a stay-at-home parent.

For example, in the fashion industry, men are sometimes not taken seriously, especially straight men. This might be because people think fashion is only for women.  

In many fields, there is discrimination against people because of their gender. To change this, we need to keep working for equality. It is slow progress, but women are getting more jobs in high positions.  More men are staying home with their children, and people are starting to accept this.

It takes time to change people's minds. We need to show people the good qualities of those who are stereotyped. We can't force change, but we can keep working to make things better.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious.  
It is no longer a crime. It is like a traffic ticket. 

Some people worry about the future. Even if it is not a crime, it can still be a problem for jobs and other things.  

It costs money to arrest people. It costs money to keep them in jail. It costs money to take them to court. 

Some places do not want to spend this money.  

Denver is a place where people are more open to change. They think it is good to spend the money saved on other things, like schools and helping the poor.  

Marijuana should not be everywhere, but it is important to think about the cost of making it illegal. 

Some people worry that if it is legal, it will be sold everywhere. People might smoke it and drive. It is still not accepted in many places.

Alcohol is worse for driving. But marijuana can have a bad effect on a person's life.  

Every person reacts to drugs differently. Some people use them too much. Some people can use them in a safe way.

I say yes.
The Catholic Church is very old. 
They have done things the same way for a long time. 
It is good to keep traditions. 
But it is also good to change.
Many Catholics go to Church every week. They follow the rules very closely. 
Sometimes I feel the Church does not like people who do not follow all the rules.
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. 
They do not accept people of other religions.
My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic.  
They would not marry in the Catholic Church. 
The Church did not accept my dad’s religion.  
This is not being kind to other religions.  
We learned to love others. 
This is a Catholic teaching. 
But it is wrong to say to love others and not accept them.
The Church teaches to do things but then does not do them.
It is old and does not change.
I think it would be good if priests could marry.
But I do not think it would stop priests from doing bad things.
It is a different problem.
People who hurt children would probably hurt children even if they were married.
It is wrong to hurt children.

I am not sure what to think about this issue. I do not believe either side is right or wrong. But this is a difficult topic. It is hard to separate church and state.  

It is also hard to define marriage. I do not know if the government should define marriage. A marriage is a religious ceremony. The government does not care if people are baptized.

I think all couples should have civil unions. The government should not care if a marriage is religious or not. If two people love each other, they should be able to get married.

If all states agree on civil unions, then it should be a law for the whole country.

But I think it is wrong to change the constitution to ban gay marriage. The constitution should not be changed for something like this. Many people care about this issue, but it is not important enough to change the constitution.

I grew up in a Christian home. I have gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle, but I think gay marriage should be legal. It should be up to each state to decide. Some states are democratic and support gay marriage. People living in those states should not have to disagree with their state's choice.

Many states are democratic, many are republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you accept their choice. I think gay people should have the same rights as everyone else.  

I already said this, but I think each state should decide about gay marriage. President Bush should not tell the whole country what to do. He does not live in every state. States should make their own rules. He will not be president forever. A new president could change the law. It is better if each state decides. They will live with the decision.

Myspace is open to the public. If you post something on Myspace, others can see it. School officials can too. Even if they are not using the school's name, they can see your posts from home.

I think the school had the right to see what was on the Myspace page. Preventing school shootings is important. It is a responsibility of the school to keep students safe.

If they use Myspace to see if students are drinking or smoking, that is different. That is an invasion of privacy. But if they are trying to prevent something bad from happening, it is not an invasion.

It is easy to express yourself more fully in writing. 

You should not post things on Myspace that you do not want others to see. Everything you post online can be found later.  

Parents trust schools to keep their children safe. School shootings are a big concern. Schools practice lockdowns and drills to prepare for emergencies.

The school officials in this case were trying to keep the school safe. They were doing what they thought was best for the students.

I support the war at first. Nine Eleven affected me. I wanted to fight back. But now, I am against it.

We went to war without a clear plan. It did not help. The people there fight with each other. They can't stop fighting.

I do not care what happens to them. They are fighting and can't get along. Their war is different than ours. They are savage. They want us to leave.

We were not ready for war. We did not know what to expect. We went to war for revenge. President Bush wanted to fight. The people wanted to fight.

We had to fight back after Nine Eleven. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do after the fighting.

We did not have a clear goal. There was no unity. We went to war based on anger. Now, we are angry.

We cannot change them. They will always fight. We need to leave.

We are not making enough progress. We need to go home. We are hurting ourselves by staying.
